title: CodeIntelAutoIndex
description: Configuration settings for repository code intel auto-indexing.

root.description: The working directory within the Docker container.

commands.description: A list of arguments to pass to docker run.

index_jobs.description: The set of index steps to be performed over a repository.

steps.description: A set of steps performed before this index job. Changes are only reflected in the repository directory.

items.description: A command to run in the docker container to perform setup with effects outside the repository root.

root.description: The path relative to the repository root where the indexer runs.

indexer.description: The name of the docker image containing the indexer.

indexer_args.description: A list of arguments to pass to docker run.

outfile.description: The path to the LSIF index relative to the index root.

requestedEnvVars.description: A list of environment variables made available to the indexer.
